actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat adoption fees in the same manner as medical expenses for income tax purposes.

summary.text: Provides that adoption fees amounting to more than three percent of the taxpayer's adjusted gross income shall be allowable as a tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat adoption fees in the same manner as medical expenses for income tax purposes.
